title: Why is LCK so bad at this game?
body:
Look at KZ getting utterly shit on by RNG. What a shame. They say it's the best region. I call bullshit.

And OMG... Pray... can't believe he gets paid to play this game.

replies.body:
Who the fuck posted this garbage?

KZ are gods!
